text: Zeeland Christian School (ZCS) is a K–12 Christian school in Zeeland, Michigan. It was established circa 1915. The school has a special education program for children with learning disabilities. By 2008 it began a expansion, paying $2 million from a $3 million capital campaign, partly to better accommodate that program. it had 1,101 students, making it Michigan's second largest private school by enrollment in a single campus, if preschoolers are included. \- Updated October 4, 2017 From the 2009–2010 school year to the 2014–2015 school year, the enrollment count minus preschoolers increased by 10%. ==References== ==External links== * Zeeland Christian School Category:Private K-12 schools in Michigan Category:Christian schools in Michigan
title: Zeeland Christian School
